application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Dischange of Planning Condition 9 (Sustainable Drainage Strategy) of Planning Permission ref: 18/14815/FUL (Erection of single storey three bedroom dwelling) (granted under Appeal Ref: APP/Z5630/W/19/3226999) dated 7th August 2019
decision_conditions: Due to sufficient information submitted for Condition 9 (Sustainable Drainage Strategy) of planning permission 18/14815/FUL the proposal fails to meet the drainage hierarchy and runoff rate requirements, set in place to prevent the development from increasing risk of flooding to the site thereby conflicting with Policy 5.13 of the London Plan (2016) and Policy CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted (2012).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Condition 14 (CO2 Reduction and Water Usage) of planning permission 21/02051/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

The Validation Local List requires a completed Biodiversity Checklist for all applications. Please download and complete a copy of the Biodiversity Checklist from: https://www.kingston.gov.uk/downloads/download/261/validation-requirements-for-planning-applications
